name: 陳育淳
objective:
1. 應用設計手繪工具與技法於各種設計作品圖面呈現，培養學生對空間、形體、材質、介面、裝置、比例等簡潔繪畫技巧與圖示性設計圖表達能力。
Students will learn to sketch by hand in various tools and technologies on design drawings. The simple painting tips as, spatial perceptive, presentation of form and materials, interfaces media types and installations, and proportion as well as abilities of the infographic design presentation will be taught in this class.
2. 學生將透過設計表現技法課程，培養對可持續發展目標（SDGs）的整體理解和感知能力，並能夠在設計表現中傳達 SDGs 所關注的環境、社會和經濟議題。
Students will develop a holistic understanding and awareness of the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) through the course of design expression techniques. They will be able to effectively communicate environmental, social, and economic issues related to the SDGs through their design presentations.
3. 培養學生審美眼力與鑑賞能力，以提升對設計作品的評估和欣賞能力。
To cultivate students' aesthetic perception and appreciation, and enhance their ability to evaluate and appreciate design works.
schedule:
九月基本練習 September - Fundamental Exercises.
(1) 課程說明。 Course Introduction.
(2) 基本形體練習 Basic Form Exercises.
(3) 形體簡化與掌握。Simplification and Mastery of Form.
(4) 構成練習。 Composition Exercises.

十月線條與角度 October - Lines and Angles.
(1) 表現立體感的筆觸練習。 Brush Strokes Exercises for Creating Three-Dimensionality.
(2) 單體線條表現。Expressing Single Lines.
(3) 投影速寫 (鍛練眼睛的記憶力) Projection Sketches (Training Visual Memory).

十一月空間與透視 November - Space and Perspective.
(1) 不同空間與角度的觀察與表現。 Observing and Depicting Different Spaces and Angles.
(2) 基本透視練習 (一點透視、兩點透視、三點透視)。 Basic Perspective Exercises (One-Point Perspective, Two-Point Perspective, Three-Point Perspective).
(3) 選擇一種透視練習結合 SDGs 議題，表達對聯合國永續發展目標的看法。: Choose a perspective exercise that combines SDGs topics to express views on the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals.

十二月比例與材質 December - Proportion and Texture.
(1) 線描表現技法。Techniques for Line Rendering.
(2) 室內外景物練習。Indoor and Outdoor Still Life Exercises.
(3) 綜合工具表現。 Integrated Tool Presentations.

一月期末成果 January: Final Project
scorePolicy:
一、出席率 (10%)：Attendance rate.
二、課堂討論與發表 (15%)：Classroom discussions and presentations.
三、作品完成與表現 (75%)：Completion and presentation of works.

remarks: 本課程結合透視練習和 SDGs 議題，培養學生以透視練習為表達工具，表達對 SDGs 議題的觀點。具體目標如下：1. 選擇 SDGs 議題：學生將選擇一個 SDGs 議題，並將這一議題融入透視練習作品中，以表達他們對該議題的關注和見解。2. 引發討論和思考：學生的作品將引發觀眾的討論和思考，激發對 SDGs 議題的關注和行動。3. 透過結合透視練習和 SDGs 議題的設計課程，我們希望學生能夠以創造性和有力的方式，用視覺表達來關注和呼籲可持續發展的重要議題。
